title: LockBit ransomware disrupted by global police operation
description: Law enforcement agencies from 11 countries have disrupted the notorious LockBit ransomware operation in a joint operation known as ''Operation Cronos." [...]

title: North Korean hackers linked to defense sector supply-chain attack
description: In an advisory today Germany's federal intelligence agency (BfV) and South Korea's National Intelligence Service (NIS) warn of an ongoing cyber-espionage operation targeting the global defense sector on behalf of the North Korean government. [...]

title: Cactus ransomware claim to steal 1.5TB of Schneider Electric data
description: The Cactus ransomware gang claims they stole 1.5TB of data from Schneider Electric after breaching the company's network last month. [...]

title: Over 28,500 Exchange servers vulnerable to actively exploited bug
description: Up to 97,000 Microsoft Exchange servers may be vulnerable to a critical severity privilege escalation flaw tracked as CVE-2024-21410 that hackers are actively exploiting. [...]

title: Hackers exploit critical RCE flaw in Bricks WordPress site builder
description: Hackers are actively exploiting a critical remote code execution (RCE) flaw impacting the Brick Builder Theme to run malicious PHP code on vulnerable sites. [...]

title: Wyze camera glitch gave 13,000 users a peek into other homes
description: ​Wyze shared more details on a security incident that impacted thousands of users on Friday and said that at least 13,000 customers could get a peek into other users' homes. [...]

title: Anatsa Android malware downloaded 150,000 times via Google Play
description: The Anatsa banking trojan has been targeting users in Europe by infecting Android devices through malware droppers hosted on Google Play. [...]
